channel.title: Comprehensible Russian on Rusland 1
channel.description: Recent content in Comprehensible Russian on Rusland 1

item.title: Wegmans? The Name Putin and the Word путь
item.description: Mr. Wegmans You can listen to it here. Around 2:54, you’ll hear that the name probably comes from путь (put), meaning ‘way’ (or ‘path’). Ms. Rutten sticks to Wegmans and doesn’t say mister. She does mention it’s a cute name, but someone interrupts her at that point.

item.title: Russian Ruble (₽)
item.description: Value and Denominations A ruble (рубль) isn’t worth much. At the moment, 1 ruble is worth 0.011 euros ( Exchange Rate). So, 100 rubles is about 1 euro. 1 ruble = 100 kopeks, the Russian word for cents. There are coins of 1, 5, 10, and 50 kopeks, and 1, 2, 5, and 10 rubles.
